SEARCH
Package com.example.vortex_app.model

Class User

java.lang.Object
com.example.vortex_app.model.User
public class User extends Object
User class to represent a user profile or entrant. This class is used for storing and retrieving user data from Firestore.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    User()
    Default constructor for the User class.
    User(String firstName, String lastName, double latitude, double longitude)
    Constructor for a user with latitude and longitude.
    User(String firstName, String lastName, String userID)
    Constructor for waiting list users with only userID, first name, and last name.
    User(String firstName, String lastName, String email, String contactInfo, String device)
    Constructor to initialize mandatory fields for a user.

  • Constructor Details

    • User

      public User()
      Default constructor for the User class. This constructor is used by Firestore for deserialization.

    • User

      public User(String firstName, String lastName, String email, String contactInfo, String device)
      Constructor to initialize mandatory fields for a user.
      Parameters:
      firstName - The first name of the user.
      lastName - The last name of the user.
      email - The email address of the user.
      contactInfo - The contact information of the user.
      device - The device information of the user.

    • User

      public User(String firstName, String lastName, String userID)
      Constructor for waiting list users with only userID, first name, and last name.
      Parameters:
      firstName - The first name of the user.
      lastName - The last name of the user.
      userID - The unique ID of the user.

    • User

      public User(String firstName, String lastName, double latitude, double longitude)
      Constructor for a user with latitude and longitude.
      Parameters:
      firstName - The first name of the user.
      lastName - The last name of the user.
      latitude - The latitude of the user's location.
      longitude - The longitude of the user's location.
